p.d: On January 16th 1988, Tina Turner, the Lioness of Rock, performed in front of a record-breaking crowd in Rio de Janeiro. Accompanied by a stunning line-up of musicians, samba dancers, glitter and pyrotechnics, Tina delivers 13 tracks in her own unique and explosive style including classic songs such as "Private Dancer," "What's Love Got To Do With It," "Let's Stay Together" and "We Don't Need Another Hero."
